name: Space (POLIMI Game Collective)
description:
Space is a really simple game you can play only by touching the screen. No complicated tricks, no sophisticated interactions, just touch the screen to launch you spaceship, but be careful you can't collide anything, the spaceship could implode !!!

You can also register your best scores, and by collecting stars in your explorations, you can then buy new spaceships which are faster !!!

See you in the space ;)

Designer: Ran Huo

Developer: Ferdinand Harmel
